dct_title_s: Sketch of public surveys in New Mexico to accompany report of Surveyor General, 1856; Surveyor General's Office, Santa Fe, New Mexico, William Pelham , Surveyor General.
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Shows inhabited settlements, drainage, and survey lines. Includes signature of Wm. Pelham, Surveyor General of N. M. 1 map: mounted on cloth; 57 x 83 cm
dct_creator_sm: United States. Surveyor General of New Mexico
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
